createProject(string,string).details: Caller must send at least `projectCreationFee` in S.

returns.projectAddress: The address of the newly created Project.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newFee: The new fee amount in wei.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.to: The recipient of the withdrawn S.

createProject(string,string).notice: Deploys a new Project for the caller.

setProjectCreationFee(uint256).notice: Owner can set or update the project creation fee.

withdraw(address).notice: Withdraws all S currently in this contract to the specified address.

documentation.text:
@notice Owner can set or update the project creation fee.
 @param newFee The new fee amount in wei.

@notice Withdraws all S currently in this contract to the specified address.
 @param to The recipient of the withdrawn S.
@notice A factory to deploy new Project instances.
